00078 class core_commit_t
00079 {
00080   enum commit_stall_t {CSTALL_NONE,      /* no stall */
00081                        CSTALL_NOT_READY, /* oldest inst not done (no uops finished) */
00082                        CSTALL_PARTIAL,   /* oldest inst not done (but some uops finished) */
00083                        CSTALL_EMPTY,     /* ROB is empty, nothing to commit */
00084                        CSTALL_JECLEAR_INFLIGHT, /* Mop is done, but its jeclear hasn't been handled yet */
00085                        CSTALL_MAX_BRANCHES, /* exceeded maximum number of branches committed per cycle */
00086                        CSTALL_num
00087                      };
00088 
00089   public:
00090 
00091   core_commit_t(void);
00092   virtual ~core_commit_t();
00093   virtual void reg_stats(struct stat_sdb_t * const sdb) = 0;
00094   virtual void update_occupancy(void) = 0;
00095 
00096   virtual void step(void) = 0;
00097   virtual void recover(const struct Mop_t * const Mop) = 0;
00098   virtual void recover(void) = 0;
00099 
00100   /* ROB management functions
00101      ROB_available() returns true if a ROB entry is available
00102      ROB_empty() returns true when there are no uops in the ROB
00103      ROB_insert() inserts a uop into the ROB
00104      ROB_fuse_insert() adds a fused uop body to the uop head
00105        (and any previously fuse_inserted uops) to an already
00106        allocated ROB entry (i.e., that alloc'd to the head) */
00107   virtual bool ROB_available(void) = 0;
00108   virtual bool ROB_empty(void) = 0;
00109   virtual void ROB_insert(struct uop_t * const uop) = 0;
00110   virtual void ROB_fuse_insert(struct uop_t * const uop) = 0;
00111 
00112   protected:
00113 
00114   struct core_t * core;
00115   static const int deadlock_threshold = 250000;
00116 };
00117 
00118 void commit_reg_options(struct opt_odb_t * odb, struct core_knobs_t * knobs);
00119 class core_commit_t * commit_create(const char * commit_opt_string, struct core_t * core);
00120 
00121 #endif /* ZESTO_COMMIT_INCLUDED */
